answers.answer: I als0 am hypo due to TT. I do have the symptoms you are decribing but i also have others including anxiety, tiredness. How long has it been since you have had blood tests and do you take meds for you hypo?

I do take my meds, I have felt tired the passed three weeks,  Today I have not been tired I cannot get confront-able for nothing.  It has been a while since I have had my blood tested.  I look up my symptoms and I found diabetes.  I have been really thirsty but I keep going back to my thyroid.

I also have days where i am so tired and then some days i am just wired with anxiety. The only thing that helps me is xanax which i hate to have to take but it helps me. I also need to be retested soon because i feel like my dosage is right. I completely understand what you mean when you say you cant seem to get comfortable. Wish i knew exactly what to tell you to help. All i can suggest is to retest and see where you are at with your levels. Much luck to you.

question: I've been sick to my stomach, light-head, and nausea. When I stand up I feel dizzy and black spots come into my eyes.  I have to sit down quickly.  I eat and I feel sick, I feel sick to my stomach all the time.  My muscles are really week all the time.  I have hypothyroid and it has been going on for three weeks.  I do not have health insurance, what do you think it could be?
title: Sick
